hep.aida
Interface IDataStyle

All Superinterfaces:
IBaseStyle
public interface IDataStyle
extends IBaseStyle

Style for the part of the scene representing the data (then histograms, functions, data point sets).

Author:
The AIDA team (http://aida.freehep.org/)
